What is JavaScript?: JavaScript is a scripting language used to create dynamic content on websites.
What is Python?: Python is a high-level, interpreted programming language known for its readability and versatility.
What is an API?: An API (Application Programming Interface) allows different software systems to communicate with each other.
What is machine learning?: Machine learning is a subset of AI that allows systems to learn and improve from data without being explicitly programmed.
What is a REST API?: A REST API is an architectural style for creating web services using HTTP requests.
What is Git?: Git is a version control system that helps track changes in source code during software development.
What is a JSON file?: JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) is a lightweight format for storing and transporting data.
What is Node.js?: Node.js is a runtime environment that allows you to run JavaScript on the server side.
What is a function in programming?: A function is a block of code that performs a specific task and can be reused.
What is OpenAI?: OpenAI is an AI research organization known for developing advanced AI models like ChatGPT and GPT-4.
What is the difference between frontend: Frontend is what users see (UI), while backend handles logic, database, and server-side functions.
How does a chatbot work?: A chatbot processes user input, finds matching responses (using rules or AI), and returns an appropriate reply.
